front.title: Extension to the ua-profile Event Package to Support the Application Profile Type

abstract.t: The Framework for Session Initiation Protocol User Agent ProfileDelivery specifies an event package (ua-profile) that can be used byuser agents to retrieve profile data. The framework also allows foroptional notification of changes to the retrieved profiles. Threeprofile types are specified: local-network, device, and user. Thisdocument extends that event package to support an additional profiletype, application. This would enable User Agents to retrieve profiledata specific to one or more applications.
